pt.runtime

Class TaskThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • pt.runtime.TaskThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    InteractiveThread, WorkerThread

    public abstract class TaskThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    This class which extends the java.lang.Thread class facilitates creating tasks threads with their own IDs. Moreover, multi task threads also have a localID in order to be identified in their own thread-pool.

    This class allows assigning instances of TaskPool to the instances of this class at the creation time via the constructor. The customized executeTask method in this class executes the task that is assigned to a specific instance of this class, and stores the final result in the TaskID instance that is associated to the task.
    Since:
    15/9/2014
    Author:
    Mostafa Mehrabi
